column5: The private backyard guest house is a great place to recharge.  625 sqft living area with kitchenette and secluded path and vegetable garden, small hills, walking paths, 5 minutes drive to Lake Austin and 20 minute drive to downtown Austin and 40 minutes to gateway to Texas Hill Country. Youâ€™ll love the views, the ambiance, privacy and the outdoors space.
column8: Quaint Hill Country Haven close to Austin
